content:
You're welcome! I'm glad I could help. It's great that you're taking proactive steps to recover your earrings and get your engagement ring resized. Remember to stay calm and polite when communicating with your cousin and the jeweler, and don't hesitate to reach out if you have any more questions or need further guidance.

Good luck with your conversations, and I hope you're reunited with your earrings and enjoying your perfectly fitting engagement ring soon!
